title: TikTok Myth of the Week: Borax Is Good to Drink
description:
I’m developing a theory that you can get anything to go viral on TikTok by mixing it into a glass of lemon water and speaking glowingly about its health benefits. This week, that something is Borax. Yes, the stuff you use in your laundry.

title: These Movie Theaters Have the Best Summer Ticket Deals
description:

title: How to Inflate an Air Mattress With a Vacuum Cleaner, Trash Bag, Hair Dryer, and More
description:

title: Everything You Should Know About Your Baby’s Birth Certificate
description:
